title: Figured out what K/DA Kai'Sa's Q sound reminds me of
body:
K-pop does not come to mind when I hear it. Instead, it reminds me of this guy:

https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/memoryalpha/images/e/e7/Algolian_musician.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180314170533&path-prefix=en

[Wiki](https://memory-alpha.fandom.com/wiki/Unnamed_musical_instruments#Algolian_musical_instrument), sound [sample](https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/memoryalpha/images/0/06/Algolian_ceremonial_rhythms.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20060319170606&path-prefix=en) from wiki.
